snippet: Strong cable television gains prove a boon for Time Warner and News Corp, the owner of a rather gaudy $25 million home that hit the market in Malibu may surprise you and Melena Ryzik chats with Steven Spielberg about the difficulties of filming...
abstract: Strong cable television gains prove a boon for Time Warner and News Corp, the owner of a rather gaudy $25 million home that hit the market in Malibu may surprise you and Melena Ryzik chats with Steven Spielberg about the difficulties of filming "Lincoln."

headline.main: The Breakfast Meeting: Cable Lifts Earnings at Time Warner and News Corp. and the Surprise Seller of a Malibu Mansion
